alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:40AM MST until February 15 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
